name: Decision Tech
description:
We know that data is a seriously valuable asset, and unlocking the information it contains is at the heart of delivering a great service to our customers.

We design, build and utilise cloud-based, scalable, modular, microservice components – smart tech - to track, collect and analyse an enormous number of data points, giving us, and other businesses, insight on the entire purchasing process.

We can learn about what our customers are looking for, and why, and gain knowledge regarding the decision-making patterns followed.

Coupled with the wealth of product and price data we receive from providers and companies both current and historic, our data architecture allows businesses the opportunity to identify valuable marketing, commercial, and customer trends. This critical data intelligence gives us - and our partners - the opportunity to make faster and smarter decisions for our businesses motivated by customer satisfaction and product monetisation.

jobs.title: Full Stack Developer
jobs.description:
Development Team Overview

Decision Tech has a fun, fast paced and energetic culture. We follow the LEAN methodology, embrace ‘no-estimates’ and employ a highly skilled team of full stack Senior Developers. We adopt new technology and systemically remove technical debt. We focus on working software delivered to end users as our measure for success. We apply cutting edge KPI driven development practices while still upholding the principles of the Agile Manifesto and Test Driven Development practices. 

We have ambitious plans for our price comparison products both improving our current online experiences and for new product verticals. We work to a flat structured team removing ego and status to quickly iterate, test, deploy and learn from our ideas. Our Developers build compelling user journeys and use technology to solve real comparison problems for our customers. 


Your role in the Dev Team

As a Developer in our Team you will be confident working anywhere in the dev stack. You will be surrounded by skilled and articulate technical peers to bounce ideas off. Perfect to help you gain experience to step up to a senior role. Our team encompasses integrated UX and Product specialist roles. The Team is constantly challenged to build the best products. You should have a passion for building sites that solve real problems for a user. You should be an articulate and driven individual. You need to be open to new approaches and feel comfortable supporting your opinions to your peers. Your friendly, professional and approachable demeanour make you easy to work with. You are a technologist, a people person, and passionate about writing great code. You relish solving complex problems and have an active say in growing the business.

Our code

Mostly MVC.NET with some other technologies used where applicable. We host on AWS (VPC) and deploy several times daily through CI/CD. DevOps are handled on team. Our code base is thoroughly tested at 6 different levels including UI/HTML and JavaScript with minimal manual regression testing required. We use AngularJS to perform comparison in real time on the client’s browser. Our site is localised for 2 different territories. We use NoSQL data stores and leverage a service orientated architecture. Code is kept up to date and technical debt prioritised and removed. We use Git for source control and don’t allow feature branches! We are working on a development blog which will start raising the profile on some of these successes. We use every means possible to keep our developers focused on improving the product and not caught up in code spaghetti.

The keyword bit… Useful skills
Full stack developer
Experience with TDD, BDD and SOLID principles
Experience of C# and the MVC framework.
Experience with front end JavaScript technologies (AngularJS, JQuery or similar)
Strong communication skills
Pragmatic approach and fast delivery of product
Kanban or Scrum or LEAN experience
Desirable experience in customer facing web sites
Desirable -Experience with Jasmine JS Unit testing
Desirable -Knowledge of NoSQL databases
Company Overview

Decision Tech is a performance marketing and data business. We generate high value, low cost leads for businesses and help customers choose the best products and services. 

We operate a portfolio of products and digital brands to solve a range of consumer and advertiser problems; broadbandchoices.co.uk, which compares broadband and mobile packages, Sellmymobile.com, Comparemymobile.com and mobilephonechecker.co.uk which compare the best place to recycle your UK mobile phone. These brands are growing via our digital marketing, product and commercial monetization skills. 

Our lead comparison technology is also utilized by major brands such as Gocompare.com and Comparethemarket.com through our Partners network. 

We are growing via acquisition, adding new businesses to our technology and marketing platform. It is an exciting time to join Decision Tech. 

Our ambitions are two-fold:

Firstly, we have a crucial role in helping our customers make the most of their digital lives, from connectivity to entertainment packages and data management, it should be personalised and simple so you find the right solutions for you. 

Secondly, we connect our customers with service and hardware providers. We pride ourselves on introducing the right customers, at the right price. We’ve helped our customers to save hundreds of millions of pounds - a fact we are pretty proud of. 

We are obsessed with performance. We want to match every single customer with the right provider, and, as we only get paid if our matches work we have an extra incentive to get it right, every time.

Package/Benefits:

25 days holiday per year + bank holidays 
Free breakfast 
Company Pension scheme 
Paid day off for your birthday 
Fruit in the office 
Annual season ticket loan 
Subsidised Gym membership 
Free massages 
Child Care voucher scheme 
Monthly Get Togethers 
Football Club 
Cycle to work scheme 
PS4 in our breakout area 
Running Club Cinema Club
